function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High temperatures due to lack of ventilation leading to loss of productivity","Impact":"Almost double the loss of productivity in current layout","Mitigation":"Implement night-time ventilation and consider adding a cooling system with local cooling and room temperature control","Technologies":"Cooling systems, ventilation systems","People":"Occupants, employees","Owner":"Facility management, building owners"},{"Description":"Cost-effectiveness of indoor climate on high-value work in the office","Impact":"Impact on total costs and cost-effectiveness","Mitigation":"Proper planning of interior design and space use to guarantee sufficient indoor air and climate quality","Technologies":"Interior design planning, air quality monitoring systems","People":"Facility management, interior designers","Owner":"Building owners, stakeholders"},{"Description":"Differences in noise levels and communication speed in open-plan vs. closed offices","Impact":"Affect on productivity and total costs","Mitigation":"Consider the nature of work and implement suitable office layout and communication technology","Technologies":"Communication technology, soundproofing materials","People":"Occupants, employees","Owner":"Facility management, building owners"}]}
